title: Tintinnalogia, or, The art of ringing wherein is laid down plain and easie rules for singing all sorts of plain changes together with directions for pricking and ringing all cross peals with a full discovery of the mystery and grounds of each peal : as also instructions for hanging of bells, with all things belonging thereunto / by a lover of that art.
author: White, Thomas, 1593-1676.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for F.S. and are to be sold by Tho. Archer ...,
